name: Out of My Mind (Xander J. Moore)
name_original: Out of My Mind (Xander J. Moore)
description:
Play as Charlie, a mentally troubled person who needs to get through the gauntlets of their own mind. Can you help them? With the assistance of some sidekicks, will they be able to overcome their greatest challenge, themselves?

Controls: 

WASD (Movement)

Mouse + Left Click (Attack)

Space (Advance Text, Dive Roll)

B (Block)

N (Use Paper Bag)

M (Use MP3 Player)

E (Freeze Time with Robin)

1 (Open Sidekick Selection Menu)

9 (Die, Respawn)

0 (Pull Up Speedrun Timer)
